review: i enjoyed this game until the whole scan the terminators mini game came up that stuff was so janky my perfectionist self got stuck trying to get those scans and i just fizzled out its a highly decent adventurestealthcombat fps with some light scavengingcrafting components
it good story
you can have sex 2 times
this game is damn near perfect i hope we either get a sequel or the end war series made into a game
time machine is out of loop
after the movies stripped terminators of their mystique and terror this game reminds us that the terminator was a horror movie

loved this they knew the mission and performed it admirably its a aa game and it doesnt pretend otherwise it fits that niche very well and is honestly the best terminator game in existence not sure i would play it again so i guess i wont be back but it was well worth the sale price i paid for it

awesome game i played this after seeing civvie 11s vid on it and do not regret it  theres a ton of things the game lets you do like setting laser traps and planting sticky bombs and i respect that but it isnt for me the gunplay is pretty rad though the hacking and lockpicking werent nearly as annoying as i fearedheck i even enjoyed it some times  great buy when on sale when not on sale still a good buy
actually really fun game and makes me believe im a resistance fighter in a dystopian world
its a love letter to fans of the og cannot recommend it enough the only thing i want from the developers is more just like it take my money
one of the best terminator games ever made

its pretty dated and has some cool ideas but these ideas here and there the ai acting is like watching lifeless dolls but it does feel good to take down some skynet bots with their own guns   its a short one but worth a playthrough at least once if the games on sale for less than 10

doom crossed with fallout style adventure terminator fan service made to feel like a movie somewhat linear very easy even on hard difficulty genarally convincingbut its soo short and sometimes it breaks the immersion sadly it was a rushed developmenti generally recommend for the atmosphere esepcially the hospital level the quick ending is surprising but repleyable and you get to play as a termintor as well

this is basically what terminator salavation should have been gameplay is nice  shooter with lite rpg elements  story is good sound effects nice add a lair of nostalgia  so basically if want to see the terminator future war done right  go play this game
hands down best terminator game loved the movies but this was somehow a better experience i wish more terminator games were made w game good job
pacing is a bit slow in the beginning but if you hang in there it gets good game has a lot of nods and interesting connection to the movies to t1  t2 a must play for fans 810
good as you can get
its so mid its excellent
its not perfect but its fairly enjoyable a for effort
good game
great game fun to play and very enjoyable
great fun aa shooter story is decent enough gameplay is good and the world of terminator is being explored at a better level than half the films

good steam deck game despite what the store page says put settings mostly to medium  fsr or whatever its called to ultra quality for a steady 60 fps lock the fps 3h battery if you dont like the blurriness and can live with a slightly lower framerate you can turn it off and lock it at 45 fps for a stable experience and 35h battery  the game itself is a surprisingly wellmade game adaptation of terminator the developers went on to make the new robocop games which are also great
fun game and vibes well with t1and 2 buy on sale with all dlc
i absolutely recommend this one great gameplay great story and really good tense moments throughout the game
thumbs up
just like the movies
one of those pieces which mostly follow og timeline alongside with a cameo engine is mostly bug free and despite being single player it can eb played over and over again

born in the 80s and raised on these films this is by far the best game in the franchise good character development good story line and great hidden references if you can find them or notice them just a shame that hollywood cant do the same and give the franchise a movie that it deserves if this game was made into a film id watch it  good job guys

incredibly good and intense fighting terminators alone can be stressful unless you plan carefully which completes the perfect execution of the idea and atmosphere of the first two films spoileralso features a mode where you play as a terminatorspoiler
excellent game especially for fans of terminator 1  2
good11111
this game is nearperfect for any terminator fans

what a journey incredible homage to terminator 1 and 2 there is nothing quite like the feeling of being hunted by terminators as you scuttle like the rat you are through the ruins left by judgement day play this game on hard or above for the full experience and the dlc annihilation line is a must play also you will get chills when you see and experience the ruined world depicted in the films
awesome not a triple a game but still a lot of fun hacking sneaking shooting and a nice survival game which gets better from time to time  music and atmosphere is amazing love story to short 3
best thing to happen to terminator franchise after t2 with tech noir cherry on top
i thought this game was the best terminator game since the t2 arcade game  everything about it is just fun and i hope they make a sequel game
best terminator game
great 80th terminator atmosphere great game  hope they will create something other terminator universe stories
awesome game i highly recommend this game need more content like part 2

just an all around fun fps definitely recommend

probably one of the best games that i played in 2025 after metroexodus picked this one on sale ties back to the terminator movies order   the terminator  terminator 2 judgement day  terminator 3 rise of the machines  terminator salvation  terminator resistance

masterpiece recommended for anyone who is a real terminator franchise fanthis game perfectly captured the true horror of encountering a  single terminatorno matter it is a t600 or t800 or t825in higher difficulty only 2 to 3 shots and you will be terminatedhuman flesh against a ruthless machine armyjust think about that resistance also supplemented the detalis of future war scenes in t1 and t2
good

solid shooter with surface level stealth and survival elements a lot of fun and a much better story than salvation an excellent game for fans of the franchise i would go as far to consider this as canon
good just dont like the save system
fun game for anyone who is a fan of the first two terminator movies

for anyone who loves the terminator franchise this game is a mustplay it does an incredible job of putting you right into the heart of the action helping you deeply understand what the characters in the films experience the gameplay is classic and simple yet it never feels outdated in fact it holds up better than many contemporary games plus the next chapter is coming soon and like the t800 ill be back
really fun rpg  shooter

all round fantastic really and a great tiein to the t1t2 canon pretty much solid in every gameplay regard albeit a little weirdly balanced at times looking at you snipers definitely worth it for any terminator fan and still enjoyable for those with no exposure to the series though it is probably better experienced by watching t1 and t2 first
this is one of the best story driven fps games ive ever played if you like terminator this is a must play i am so sad i beat it i didnt want it to end
very good and relaxing game in the realm of terminator nice combination of sneaking rpg and shooter
